com.nds.pkg

Class connect

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.nds.pkg.connect

  • public class connect
extends java.lang.Object
    Establishes connection between the database and classes. May add, view, and modify fields in the database.
    Version:
    1
    Author:
    Lee Katsumata

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      connect()
      Constructs the connection to the database.

                       int PID)
        Adds a new subscription to a given customerID's list of subscriptions.
        Parameters:
        SID - The int that identifies the set of subscriptions to add to
        PID - The int that identifies the publication that should be added to the subscriptions

      • addCustomer

        public void addCustomer(java.lang.String fN,
                        java.lang.String lN,
                        java.lang.String pN,
                        java.lang.String addLn1,
                        java.lang.String addLn2,
                        java.lang.String c,
                        java.lang.String st,
                        java.lang.String z)
        Adds a new customer with the given descriptive information.
        Parameters:
        fN - The customer's first name
        lN - The customer's last name
        pN - The customer's phone number
        addLn1 - The customer's address
        addLn2 - The customer's address line two (optional)
        c - The customer's city
        st - The customer's state
        z - The customer's zip code

      • searchCustomer

        public java.sql.ResultSet searchCustomer(int CID,
                                         java.lang.String fN,
                                         java.lang.String lN)
        Returns the ResultSet containing the set of customers that match the given information. This method is to accept either a CustomerID or a name. If the CustomerID is provided, one customer with the given ID will be in the ResultSet. If a name (first, last, or both) is provided, all customers that match the given information will be in the ResultSet.
        Parameters:
        CID - The int that identifies the customer to search for
        fN - The first name of the customer to search for
        lN - The last name of the customer to search for
        Returns:
        ResultSet

      • modCustomerInfo

        public boolean modCustomerInfo(int CID,
                               java.lang.String type,
                               java.lang.String to)
        Modifies a specified field of the customer's information. Returns whether the modification was successfully made.
        Parameters:
        CID - The int that identifies the customer to be modified
        type - The type of information to be modified (FirstName, LastName, Address, etc.)
        to - The string that the specified information will be modified to
        Returns:
        boolean

      • modCustomerInfo

        public boolean modCustomerInfo(int CID,
                               java.lang.String fN,
                               java.lang.String lN,
                               java.lang.String addLn1,
                               java.lang.String addLn2,
                               java.lang.String c,
                               java.lang.String s,
                               java.lang.String z,
                               java.lang.String pN)
        Modifies all of the customer's information at once in the database. Returns whether the modification was successfully made. Although it is not likely that all fields will be modified, any combination of them may be modified using this method. Does not modify customer status.
        Parameters:
        CID - The int that identifies the customer to be modified
        fN - The customer's new first name
        lN - The customer's new last name
        addLn1 - The customer's new address
        addLn2 - The customer's new address line two (optional)
        c - The customer's new city
        s - The customer's new state
        z - The customer's new zip code
        pN - The customer's new phone number
        Returns:
        boolean

      • getCustomerID

        public int getCustomerID(java.lang.String pN)
        Returns the customer's ID based off of the phone number (unique). This is necessary because the customer ID is automatically generated within the database.
        Parameters:
        pN - The phone number to search for the customer ID by
        Returns:
        int

      • addPublication

        public void addPublication(java.lang.String t,
                           java.lang.String g,
                           double p,
                           boolean[] d,
                           java.lang.String f)
        Adds a new publication to the database.
        Parameters:
        t - The title of the publication
        g - The genre of the publication
        p - The price of the publication
        d - The array holding an indicator for whether the publication is delivered on each day of the week (Monday to Sunday)
        f - The frequency of the publication (Daily, Weekly, Monthly)

      • getPublicationID

        public int getPublicationID(java.lang.String t)
        Returns the publication ID based off of the title (unique). This is necessary because the PunlicationID is automatically generated in the database.
        Parameters:
        t - The title of the publication to get the ID for
        Returns:
        int

      • searchPublication

        public java.sql.ResultSet searchPublication(int PID,
                                            java.lang.String t)
        Returns the ResultSet containing publications that fall under the criteria searched for. If the caller provides a PublicationID, one publication will be in the ResultSet. If the caller provides a title, all publications that contain the given title will be in the ResultSet
        Parameters:
        PID - The int that identifies the publication to search for
        t - The title of the publication to search for
        Returns:
        ResultSet

      • modPublicationInfo

        public boolean modPublicationInfo(int PID,
                                  double newPrice)
        Modifies publication price. Returns whether the modification was successfully made.
        Parameters:
        PID - The int that identifies the publication to modify
        newPrice - The publication's new price
        Returns:
        boolean

      • modPublicationInfo

        public boolean modPublicationInfo(int PID,
                                  java.lang.String st)
        Modifies the publication status. Returns whether the modification was successfully made.
        Parameters:
        PID - The in that identifies the publication to modify
        st - The new status of the publication
        Returns:
